name: PS_006: Terminal Mode (Standalone Demo to Standalone) - the mode should switch successfully when changing the terminal mode.
fullName: test/specs/app-settings/PS_006.e2e.js#Sprint 27: Payconnect 2.0 Terminal - Payconnect App Settings.PS_006: Terminal Mode (Standalone Demo to Standalone) - the mode should switch successfully when changing the terminal mode.
description:
The mode should switch from (Standalone Demo to Standalone) successfully when changing the terminal mode.

### Preconditions
1. The terminal must be connected to a stable internet connection.
2. The terminal is registered in the Payconnect portal.
3. The user should be able to access the settings using the terminal password.
4. The terminal has no recorded transactions, or all transactions have been settled.
descriptionHtml:
The mode should switch from (Standalone Demo to Standalone) successfully when changing the terminal mode.

Preconditions

  1. The terminal must be connected to a stable internet connection.
  2. The terminal is registered in the Payconnect portal.
  3. The user should be able to access the settings using the terminal password.
  4. The terminal has no recorded transactions, or all transactions have been settled.
